ygData.subject: Re: CoD and DDD damage.
ygData.msgSnippet: [SNIP] ... From: Bard  Sent: Sunday, November 21, 1999 2:26 PM Subject: Re: [eqbards] CoD and DDD damage. ... higher ... were red  ... it
ygData.messageBody:
[SNIP]
----- Original Message -----
From: Bard <dabard@...>
Sent: Sunday, November 21, 1999 2:26 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] CoD and DDD damage.


> noticed that although DDD may be more powerful, CoD will be resisited by
higher
> level creatures MUCH less often. About the only things that resisted it
were red \
> cons that were upper 30's-ish to maybe 40. Don't take my word for it, try
it
> yourself and see ;o)
>
> -=B=-
> The Rathe

Yeah - I've noticed that too - I figure its because I've only known DDD for
4 levels and CoD for many more --- When I get resisted, I just keep
weaving - eventually, I slip a few in and they are damaged...

Brangwen Incantare
The Rathe
